text: Lorna Beal (n√©e Larter; 28 November 1923 - 10 August 2020) was an Australian cricketer. She played seven Test matches for the Australian women's cricket team between 1948 and 1951. Beal was born in Hawthorn, Victoria. She died in 2020 at the age of 96. ==References== ==Other websites== *Lorna Beal at CricketArchive Category:1923 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Australian cricketers Category:Cricketers from Melbourne Category:Sportswomen
title: Lorna Beal
